name: PeerMe MultiSig: Check User Role
description: Verify a user's role and permissions in a MultiSig wallet. Use this to determine if an address is a board member (can sign), proposer (can propose), or has no access.

inputs.name: User Address

description.en: The wallet address to check permissions for.
description.de: Die Wallet-Adresse, deren Berechtigungen geprüft werden sollen.

inputs.bot: Default to the user's own wallet address unless they specify someone else.

output.ROLE_NAME: transform:() => { const role = Number(results.ROLE); if (role === 0) return 'None'; if (role === 1) return 'Proposer'; if (role === 2) return 'Board Member'; return 'Unknown'; }

messages.success: User {{USER_ADDRESS}} has role: {{ROLE_NAME}}. Can propose: {{CAN_PROPOSE}}, Can sign: {{CAN_SIGN}}.
